report.title: Osiris tabular specific biotopes
report.description: Tabular output for Osiris specific biotopes for a sample.
report.query: select #columns# from ( select t_sb.id as "id", s.id as "sample_or_list_id", t_sb.id as "term_id", t_bb.term as "bb_term", t_sb.term as "term", count(distinct cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id) as "speciescount", count(distinct cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id)::float * 100 / ( select count(distinct ttlsub.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id) from cache_taxa_taxon_lists ttlsub join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values avsub on avsub.taxa_taxon_list_id=ttlsub.id and avsub.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=#sb_attr_id# and avsub.int_value=t_sb.id ) as "rep", sqi.sqi, string_agg(coalesce(td.code, td.abbreviation), '|' order by td.code) as "cons" from cache_termlists_terms t_bb join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values av_bb on av_bb.int_value=t_bb.id and av_bb.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=#bb_attr_id# and av_bb.deleted=false join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id=av_bb.taxa_taxon_list_id #joins# join taxa_taxon_lists ttl on ttl.id=cttl.id join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values av_sb on av_sb.taxa_taxon_list_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and av_sb.deleted=false and av_sb.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=#sb_attr_id# join cache_termlists_terms t_sb on t_sb.id=av_sb.int_value left join ( select av_sb1.int_value as sb_id, round(avg(rscv.int_value)*100) as sqi from cache_occurrences_functional o join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values av_sb1 on av_sb1.taxa_taxon_list_id=o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and av_sb1.deleted=false and av_sb1.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=#sb_attr_id# join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values rscv on rscv.taxa_taxon_list_id=o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and rscv.deleted=false and rscv.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=#rarity_score_attr_id# where o.sample_id=#sample_id# group by av_sb1.int_value ) as sqi on sqi.sb_id=av_sb.int_value left join (taxa_taxon_designations ttd join taxon_designations td on td.id=ttd.taxon_designation_id and td.deleted=false and coalesce(td.code, td.abbreviation) not in ('LC', 'None') ) on ttd.taxon_id=ttl.taxon_id and ttd.deleted=false group by t_sb.id, s.id, t_sb.id, t_bb.term, t_sb.term, sqi.sqi ) as sub

joins.join: join cache_occurrences_functional o on o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id join cache_samples_functional s on s.website_id=o.website_id and s.survey_id=o.survey_id and s.id=o.sample_id and s.id=#sample_id#
join scratchpad_list_entries sle on sle.entry_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id join scratchpad_lists s on s.id=sli.scratchpad_list_id and s.deleted=false and s.scratchpad_list_id=#sample_id#

column.name: rep
column.sql: case when sub.rep<1 then '<1' else round(sub.rep)::varchar end
